ygData.subject: RE: RE: Simply Charming...
ygData.msgSnippet: Is guise of the deceiver a face piece? I thought it was a head piece. (My highest character is level 18. So I ve never really seen one... I level slow)
ygData.messageBody:
Is guise of the deceiver a face piece? I thought it was a head piece. (My
highest character is level 18. So I've never really seen one... I level
slow)

>-----Original Message-----
>From: James Schuldes [mailto:jgs@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 9:36 AM

>Yes, I have one ;) - but my guise of the deceiver is better cha -
>or maybe I
>am mistaken there.
>
>Syl
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Perhaps a Princess... [mailto:sarah@...]
> Sent: Tuesday, December 14, 1999 11:23 AM

>Note: The silver star ruby veil also has a Charisma bonus on
>it.
>(It goes on the face)
>
>It is part of my chanter's permanent armor. (Enchanters like
>charisma)
